verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying נֶ֗פֶשׁ <WH5315> If a soul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If תֶחֱטָ֤א <WH2398> shall sin בִשְׁגָגָה֙ <WH7684> through ignorance מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> any מִצְוֹ֣ת <WH4687> against any of the commandments יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תֵעָשֶׂ֑ינָה <WH6213> [concerning things] which ought not to be done וְעָשָׂ֕ה <WH6213> and shall do מֵאַחַ֖ת <WH259> against any מֵהֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2007> of them

אִ֣ם <WH518> if הַכֹּהֵ֧ן <WH3548> If the priest הַמָּשִׁ֛יחַ <WH4899> that is anointed יֶחֱטָ֖א <WH2398> do sin לְאַשְׁמַ֣ת <WH819> according to the sin הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people וְהִקְרִ֡יב <WH7126> then let him bring עַ֣ל <WH5921> as חַטָּאתוֹ֩ <WH2403> for his sin אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> he חָטָ֜א <WH2398> which he hath sinned פַּ֣ר <WH6499> bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> afflicted בָּקָ֥ר <WH1241> bull תָּמִ֛ים <WH8549> without blemish לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> for a sin offering

וְהֵבִ֣יא <WH935> And he shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֗ר <WH6499> the bullock אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֛תַח <WH6607> unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְסָמַ֤ךְ <WH5564> and shall lay אֶת־ <WH853> יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> head הַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> upon the bullock's וְשָׁחַ֥ט <WH7819> and kill אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֖ר <WH6499> the bullock לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְלָקַ֛ח <WH3947> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <WH3548> And the priest הַמָּשִׁ֖יחַ <WH4899> that is anointed מִדַּ֣ם <WH1818> blood הַפָּ֑ר <WH6499> of the bullock's וְהֵבִ֥יא <WH935> and bring אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> it to the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְטָבַ֧ל <WH2881> shall dip הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶת־ <WH853> אֶצְבָּע֖וֹ <WH676> his finger בַּדָּ֑ם <WH1818> in the blood וְהִזָּ֨ה <WH5137> and sprinkle מִן־ <WH4480> some הַדָּ֜ם <WH1818> of the blood שֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִים֙ <WH6471> times לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before פָּרֹ֥כֶת <WH6532> the vail הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> of the sanctuary

וְנָתַן֩ <WH5414> shall put הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <WH3548> And the priest מִן־ <WH4480> some הַדָּ֜ם <WH1818> [some] of the blood עַל־ <WH5921> on קַ֠רְנוֹת <WH7161> upon the horns מִזְבַּ֨ח <WH4196> of the altar קְטֹ֤רֶת <WH7004> incense הַסַּמִּים֙ <WH5561> of sweet לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> which [is] in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all דַּ֣ם <WH1818> all the blood הַפָּ֗ר <WH6499> of the bullock יִשְׁפֹּךְ֙ <WH8210> and shall pour אֶל־ <WH413> at יְסוֹד֙ <WH3247> at the bottom מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> of the altar הָעֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> of the burnt offering אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> which [is at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֵ֛לֶב <WH2459> from it all the fat פַּ֥ר <WH6499> of the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> for the sin offering יָרִ֣ים <WH7311> And he shall take off מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> that covereth עַל־ <WH5921> and הַקֶּ֔רֶב <WH7130> the inwards וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַחֵ֔לֶב <WH2459> and all the fat אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <WH7130> that [is] upon the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <WH3629> kidneys וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עֲלֵיהֶ֔ן <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <WH3689> that [is] upon them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3508> and the caul עַל־ <WH5921> of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> above the liver עַל־ <WH5921> with הַכְּלָי֖וֹת <WH3629> with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5493> it shall he take away

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> it יוּרַ֔ם <WH7311> As it was taken off מִשּׁ֖וֹר <WH7794> from the bullock זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> of peace offerings וְהִקְטִירָם֙ <WH6999> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> and the priest עַ֖ל <WH5921> on מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> them upon the altar הָעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> of the burnt offering

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ע֤וֹר <WH5785> And the skin הַפָּר֙ <WH6499> of the bullock וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <WH1320> and all his flesh עַל־ <WH5921> with רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> with his head וְעַל־ <WH5921> and its כְּרָעָ֑יו <WH3767> and with his legs וְקִרְבּ֖וֹ <WH7130> and his inwards וּפִרְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6569> and his dung

וְהוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> shall he carry forth אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> is all הַ֠פָּר <WH6499> Even the whole bullock אֶל־ <WH413> where מִח֨וּץ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֜ה <WH4264> the camp אֶל־ <WH413> where מָק֤וֹם <WH4725> place טָהוֹר֙ <WH2889> unto a clean אֶל־ <WH413> where שֶׁ֣פֶךְ <WH8211> are poured out הַדֶּ֔שֶׁן <WH1880> where the ashes וְשָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> and burn אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> where עֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> him on the wood בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> with fire עַל־ <WH5921> where שֶׁ֥פֶךְ <WH8211> are poured out הַדֶּ֖שֶׁן <WH1880> the ashes יִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <WH8313> shall he be burnt פ

וְאִ֨ם <WH518> now if כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole עֲדַ֤ת <WH5712> And if the whole congregation יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel יִשְׁגּ֔וּ <WH7686> sin through ignorance וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <WH5956> be hid דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> and the thing מֵעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> from the eyes הַקָּהָ֑ל <WH6951> of the assembly וְ֠עָשׂוּ <WH6213> and they have done אַחַ֨ת <WH259> [somewhat against] any מִכָּל־ <WH3605> the whole מִצְוֹ֧ת <WH4687> of the commandments יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> not תֵעָשֶׂ֖ינָה <WH6213> [concerning things] which should not be done וְאָשֵֽׁמוּ׃ <WH816> and are guilty

וְנֽוֹדְעָה֙ <WH3045> against it is known הַֽחַטָּ֔את <WH2403> When the sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָטְא֖וּ <WH2398> which they have sinned עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> and וְהִקְרִ֨יבוּ <WH7126> shall offer הַקָּהָ֜ל <WH6951> then the congregation פַּ֤ר <WH6499> bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> afflicted בָּקָר֙ <WH1241> of the herd לְחַטָּ֔את <WH2403> for the sin וְהֵבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> and bring אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> him before אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְ֠סָמְכוּ <WH5564> shall lay זִקְנֵ֨י <WH2205> And the elders הָעֵדָ֧ה <WH5712> of the congregation אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֛ם <WH3027> their hands עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head הַפָּ֖ר <WH6499> of the bullock לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְשָׁחַ֥ט <WH7819> shall be killed אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֖ר <WH6499> and the bullock לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְהֵבִ֛יא <WH935> shall bring הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <WH3548> And the priest הַמָּשִׁ֖יחַ <WH4899> that is anointed מִדַּ֣ם <WH1818> blood הַפָּ֑ר <WH6499> of the bullock's אֶל־ <WH413> to אֹ֖הֶל <WH168> to the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְטָבַ֧ל <WH2881> shall dip הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶצְבָּע֖וֹ <WH676> his finger מִן־ <WH4480> in הַדָּ֑ם <WH1818> [in some] of the blood וְהִזָּ֞ה <WH5137> and sprinkle שֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> [it] seven פְּעָמִים֙ <WH6471> times לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵ֖ת <WH853> פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> [even] before הַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <WH6532> the vail

וּמִן־ <WH4480> some הַדָּ֞ם <WH1818> [some] of the blood יִתֵּ֣ן ׀ <WH5414> And he shall put עַל־ <WH5921> on קַרְנֹ֣ת <WH7161> upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <WH4196> of the altar אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> which [is] before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> that [is] in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַדָּ֗ם <WH1818> all the blood יִשְׁפֹּךְ֙ <WH8210> and shall pour out אֶל־ <WH413> at יְסוֹד֙ <WH3247> at the bottom מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> of the altar הָעֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> of the burnt offering אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> which [is at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֶלְבּ֖וֹ <WH2459> all his fat יָרִ֣ים <WH7311> And he shall take מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at וְהִקְטִ֖יר <WH6999> from him and burn הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <WH4196> [it] upon the altar

וְעָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> And he shall do לַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> with the bullock כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> he עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> as he did לְפַ֣ר <WH6499> with the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֔את <WH2403> for a sin offering כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> thus יַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> so shall he do לּ֑וֹ וְכִפֶּ֧ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement עֲלֵהֶ֛ם <WH5921> with הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> with this and the priest וְנִסְלַ֥ח <WH5545> for them and it shall be forgiven לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

וְהוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> And he shall carry forth אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֗ר <WH6499> the bullock אֶל־ <WH413> about מִחוּץ֙ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> the camp וְשָׂרַ֣ף <WH8313> and burn אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> it שָׂרַ֔ף <WH8313> him as he burned אֵ֖ת <WH853> הַפָּ֣ר <WH6499> bullock הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> the first חַטַּ֥את <WH2403> it [is] a sin offering הַקָּהָ֖ל <WH6951> for the congregation הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he פ

אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> When נָשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> When a ruler יֶֽחֱטָ֑א <WH2398> hath sinned וְעָשָׂ֡ה <WH6213> and done אַחַ֣ת <WH259> [against] any מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all מִצְוֹת֩ <WH4687> of the commandments יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֜יו <WH430> his God אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> not תֵעָשֶׂ֛ינָה <WH6213> [concerning things] which should not be done בִּשְׁגָגָ֖ה <WH7684> [somewhat] through ignorance וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <WH816> and is guilty

אֽוֹ־ <WH176> if הוֹדַ֤ע <WH3045> come to his knowledge אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about חַטָּאת֔וֹ <WH2403> Or if his sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָטָ֖א <WH2398> wherein he hath sinned בָּ֑הּ וְהֵבִ֧יא <WH935> he shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנ֛וֹ <WH7133> his offering שְׂעִ֥יר <WH8163> a kid עִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> of the goats זָכָ֥ר <WH2145> a male תָּמִֽים׃ <WH8549> without blemish

וְסָמַ֤ךְ <WH5564> And he shall lay יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head הַשָּׂעִ֔יר <WH8163> of the goat וְשָׁחַ֣ט <WH7819> and kill אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> בִּמְק֛וֹם <WH4725> it in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where יִשְׁחַ֥ט <WH7819> where they kill אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> the burnt offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> it [is] a sin offering הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְלָקַ֨ח <WH3947> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> And the priest מִדַּ֤ם <WH1818> of the blood הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> of the sin offering בְּאֶצְבָּע֔וֹ <WH676> with his finger וְנָתַ֕ן <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on קַרְנֹ֖ת <WH7161> [it] upon the horns מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> of the altar הָעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> דָּמ֣וֹ <WH1818> his blood יִשְׁפֹּ֔ךְ <WH8210> and shall pour out אֶל־ <WH413> at יְס֖וֹד <WH3247> at the bottom מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> of the altar הָעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> of burnt offering

וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> All חֶלְבּוֹ֙ <WH2459> all his fat יַקְטִ֣יר <WH6999> And he shall burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> upon the altar כְּחֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> as the fat זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> of peace offerings וְכִפֶּ֨ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <WH5921> and הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> and the priest מֵחַטָּאת֖וֹ <WH2403> for him as concerning his sin וְנִסְלַ֥ח <WH5545> and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃ פ

וְאִם־ <WH518> now if נֶ֧פֶשׁ <WH5315> one אַחַ֛ת <WH259> And if any תֶּחֱטָ֥א <WH2398> sin בִשְׁגָגָ֖ה <WH7684> through ignorance מֵעַ֣ם <WH5971> people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the common בַּ֠עֲשֹׂתָהּ <WH6213> while he doeth אַחַ֨ת <WH259> [somewhat against] any מִמִּצְוֹ֧ת <WH4687> of the commandments יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> not תֵעָשֶׂ֖ינָה <WH6213> [concerning things] which ought not to be done וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <WH816> and be guilty

א֚וֹ <WH176> if הוֹדַ֣ע <WH3045> come to his knowledge אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about חַטָּאת֖וֹ <WH2403> Or if his sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָטָ֑א <WH2398> which he hath sinned וְהֵבִ֨יא <WH935> then he shall bring קָרְבָּנ֜וֹ <WH7133> his offering שְׂעִירַ֤ת <WH8166> a kid עִזִּים֙ <WH5795> of the goats תְּמִימָ֣ה <WH8549> without blemish נְקֵבָ֔ה <WH5347> a female עַל־ <WH5921> for חַטָּאת֖וֹ <WH2403> for his sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָטָֽא׃ <WH2398> which he hath sinned

וְסָמַךְ֙ <WH5564> And he shall lay אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> his hand עַ֖ל <WH5921> on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head הַֽחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> of the sin offering וְשָׁחַט֙ <WH7819> and slay אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣חַטָּ֔את <WH2403> the sin offering בִּמְק֖וֹם <WH4725> in the place הָעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> of the burnt offering
